author: Kometa-Team
install_msg: SponsorCheck installed. Use the command to verify if a GitHub user is a public sponsor of the target (default: meisnate12).
name: sponsorcheck
short: Check if a GitHub user publicly sponsors a target (current vs past).
description: Scrapes the public GitHub Sponsors page to see if a username appears as a current or past public sponsor. Private sponsors are not visible publicly.
